✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &           * (kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2op,indmp) - kb_mn2o(ig,jmn2o,indmp))

    


    

    
4408

    ✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
          absn2o = n2om1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2om2 - n2om1)

    


    

    
4409

    
    

    

    


    

    
4410

    
    

    
          tau_major = speccomb                                          &

    


    

    
4411

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &              * (fac000*absb(ig,id000) + fac010*absb(ig,id010)    &

    


    

    
4412

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &              +  fac100*absb(ig,id100) + fac110*absb(ig,id110))

    


    

    
4413

    
    

    

    


    

    
4414

    
    

    
          tau_major1 = speccomb1                                        &

    


    

    
4415

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &              * (fac001*absb(ig,id001) + fac011*absb(ig,id011)    &

    


    

    
4416

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &              +  fac101*absb(ig,id101) + fac111*absb(ig,id111))

    


    

    
4417

    
    

    

    


    

    
4418

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
30081024

    
          taug(ns03+ig,k) = tau_major + tau_major1                      &

    


    

    
4419

    ✗✓
    
15040512

    
     &                    + taufor + adjcoln2o*absn2o

    


    

    
4420

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
31021056

    
     &                     * (fracrefb(ig,jplp) - fracrefb(ig,jpl))

    


    

    
4423

    
    

    
        enddo

      enddo

      end subroutine taugb03

      subroutine taugb04

    


    

    
4433

    
    

    
! ..................................

!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4436

    
    

    
!     band 4:  630-700 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; high key - o3,co2)     !

    


    

    
4437

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4438

    
    

    

    


    

    
4439

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb04

    


    

    
4440

    
    

    

    


    

    
4441

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
4442

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, jpl, jplp,    &

    


    

    
4443

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, ig, js, js1,     &

    


    

    
4444

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211

    


    

    
4445

    
    

    

    


    

    
4446

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, p, p4, fk0, fk1, fk2,   &

    


    

    
4447

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,         &

    


    

    
4448

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,        &

    


    

    
4449

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,        &

    


    

    
4450

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,             &

    


    

    
4451

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,             &

    


    

    
4452

    
    
55296

    
     &      refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, tau_major, tau_major1

    


    

    
4453

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4454

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
4455

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4456

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,11)/chi_mls(2,11)     ! P = 142.5940 mb

    


    

    
4457

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,13)/chi_mls(2,13)     ! P = 95.58350 mb

    


    

    
4458

    
    

    

    


    

    
4459

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
4460

    
    

    

    


    

    
4461

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
4462

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4463

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
4464

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
4465

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
4466

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
4467

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(4) + js

    


    

    
4468

    
    

    

    


    

    
4469

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4470

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1

    


    

    
4471

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
4472

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
4473

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
4474

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = ( jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(4) + js1

    


    

    
4475

    
    

    

    


    

    
4476

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4477

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
4478

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)

    


    

    
4479

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
4480

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, 1.0)

    


    

    
4481

    
    

    

    


    

    
4482

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
4483

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
4484

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
4485

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
4486

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
4487

    
    

    

    


    

    
4488

    ✓✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm < 0.125) then

    


    

    
4489

    
    
502669

    
          p = fs - f_one

    


    

    
4490

    
    
502669

    
          p4 = p**4

    


    

    
4491

    
    
502669

    
          fk0 = p4

    


    

    
4492

    
    
502669

    
          fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4

    


    

    
4493

    
    
502669

    
          fk2 = p + p4

    


    

    
4494

    
    
502669

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
4495

    
    
502669

    
          id010 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
4496

    
    
502669

    
          id100 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
4497

    
    
502669

    
          id110 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
4498

    
    
502669

    
          id200 = ind0 + 2

    


    

    
4499

    
    
502669

    
          id210 = ind0 +11

    


    

    
4500

    ✓✓
    
2925683

    
        elseif (specparm > 0.875) then

    


    

    
4501

    
    
1835

    
          p = -fs

    


    

    
4502

    
    
1835

    
          p4 = p**4

    


    

    
4503

    
    
1835

    
          fk0 = p4

    


    

    
4504

    
    
1835

    
          fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4

    


    

    
4505

    
    
1835

    
          fk2 = p + p4

    


    

    
4506

    
    
1835

    
          id000 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
4507

    
    
1835

    
          id010 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
4508

    
    
1835

    
          id100 = ind0

    


    

    
4509

    
    
1835

    
          id110 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
4510

    
    
1835

    
          id200 = ind0 - 1

    


    

    
4511

    
    
1835

    
          id210 = ind0 + 8

    


    

    
4512

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
4513

    
    
2923848

    
          fk0 = f_one - fs

    


    

    
4514

    
    
2923848

    
          fk1 = fs

    


    

    
4515

    
    
2923848

    
          fk2 = f_zero

    


    

    
4516

    
    
2923848

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
4517

    
    
2923848

    
          id010 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
4518

    
    
2923848

    
          id100 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
4519

    
    
2923848

    
          id110 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
4520

    
    
2923848

    
          id200 = ind0

    


    

    
4521

    
    
2923848

    
          id210 = ind0

    


    

    
4522

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
4523

    
    

    

    


    

    
4524

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac000 = fk0*fac00(k)

    


    

    
4525

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac100 = fk1*fac00(k)

    


    

    
4526

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac200 = fk2*fac00(k)

    


    

    
4527

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac010 = fk0*fac10(k)

    


    

    
4528

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac110 = fk1*fac10(k)

    


    

    
4529

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac210 = fk2*fac10(k)

    


    

    
4530

    
    

    

    


    

    
4531

    ✓✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm1 < 0.125) then

    


    

    
4532

    
    
214544

    
          p = fs1 - f_one

    


    

    
4533

    
    
214544

    
          p4 = p**4

    


    

    
4534

    
    
214544

    
          fk0 = p4

    


    

    
4535

    
    
214544

    
          fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4

    


    

    
4536

    
    
214544

    
          fk2 = p + p4

    


    

    
4537

    
    
214544

    
          id001 = ind1

    


    

    
4538

    
    
214544

    
          id011 = ind1 + 9

    


    

    
4539

    
    
214544

    
          id101 = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
4540

    
    
214544

    
          id111 = ind1 +10

    


    

    
4541

    
    
214544

    
          id201 = ind1 + 2

    


    

    
4542

    
    
214544

    
          id211 = ind1 +11

    


    

    
4543

    ✓✓
    
3213808

    
        elseif (specparm1 > 0.875) then

    


    

    
4544

    
    
88660

    
          p = -fs1

    


    

    
4545

    
    
88660

    
          p4 = p**4

    


    

    
4546

    
    
88660

    
          fk0 = p4

    


    

    
4547

    
    
88660

    
          fk1 = f_one - p - 2.0*p4

    


    

    
4548

    
    
88660

    
          fk2 = p + p4

    


    

    
4549

    
    
88660

    
          id001 = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
4550

4553

4554

4556

    ✗✓✗✓

      do k = laytrop+1, nlay

    


    

    
4600

940032

    ✗✓✗✓

    
940032

    
        specparm = colamt(k,3) / speccomb

    


    

    
4602

    
    
940032

4603

    
    
940032

4604

    
    
940032

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
940032

940032

4610

    
    
940032

4611

4613

    
    

    

    


    

    
4614

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
940032

4615

940032

4616

4618

4619

    
    
940032

4621

    
    
940032

4622

      subroutine taugb05

    


    

    
4678

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
4679

    
    

    

    


    

    
4680

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4681

    
    

    
!     band 5:  700-820 cm-1 (low key - h2o,co2; low minor - o3, ccl4)  !

    


    

    
4682

    
    

    
!                           (high key - o3,co2)                        !

    


    

    
4683

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4684

    
    

    

    


    

    
4685

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb05

    


    

    
4686

    
    

    

    


    

    
4687

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
4688

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp,  &

    


    

    
4689

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jmo3, jmo3p,     &

    


    

    
4690

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jpl, jplp,       &

    


    

    
4691

    
    
55296

    
     &       ig, js, js1

    


    

    
4692

    
    

    

    


    

    
4693

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys)  :: tauself, taufor, o3m1, o3m2, abso3,     &

    


    

    
4694

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,         &

    


    

    
4695

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,        &

    


    

    
4696

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb_mo3,   specparm_mo3,   specmult_mo3,   fmo3,       &

    


    

    
4697

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,        &

    


    

    
4698

    
    
55296

    
     &      refrat_planck_a, refrat_planck_b, refrat_m_a,               &

    


    

    
4699

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,             &

    


    

    
4700

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,             &

    


    

    
4701

    
    
55296

    
     &      p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21

    


    

    
4702

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4703

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
4704

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4705

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level :

    


    

    
4706

    
    

    
!     lower - o3, p = 317.34 mbar, t = 240.77 k

    


    

    
4707

    
    

    
!     lower - ccl4

    


    

    
4708

    
    

    

    


    

    
4709

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
4710

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.

    


    

    
4711

    
    

    

    


    

    
4712

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,5)/chi_mls(2,5)      ! P = 473.420 mb

    


    

    
4713

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_b = chi_mls(3,43)/chi_mls(2,43)    ! P = 0.2369  mb

    


    

    
4714

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,7)/chi_mls(2,7)           ! P = 317.348 mb

    


    

    
4715

    
    

    

    


    

    
4716

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
4717

    
    

    

    


    

    
4718

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
4719

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4720

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
4721

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
4722

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
4723

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
4724

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15040512

    
     &                * (fac000*absb(ig,id000) + fac010*absb(ig,id010)  &

    


    

    
4924

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

     &                +  fac100*absb(ig,id100) + fac110*absb(ig,id110)) &

    ✗✓✗✓

✗✓		
    
30081024

    
     &                + wx(k,1) * ccl4(ig)

!> Band 6:  820-980 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2)

4941

    
    

    
! ----------------------------------

    


    

    
4942

    
    
55296

    
      subroutine taugb06

    


    

    
4943

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
4944

    
    

    

    


    

    
4945

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4946

    
    

    
!     band 6:  820-980 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2)           !

    


    

    
4947

    
    

    
!                           (high key - none; high minor - cfc11, cfc12)

    


    

    
4948

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4949

    
    

    

    


    

    
4950

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb06

    


    

    
4951

    
    

    

    


    

    
4952

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
4953

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &

    


    

    
4954

    
    
55296

    
     &       indm, indmp, ig

    


    

    
4955

    
    

    

    


    

    
4956

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2, tauself,      &

    


    

    
4957

    
    
55296

    
     &      taufor, absco2, temp

    


    

    
4958

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4959

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
4960

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4961

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level:

    


    

    
4962

    
    

    
!     lower - co2, p = 706.2720 mb, t = 294.2 k

    


    

    
4963

    
    

    
!     upper - cfc11, cfc12

    


    

    
4964

    
    

    

    


    

    
4965

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
4966

    
    

    

    


    

    
4967

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
4968

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt (k)-1)) * nspa(6) + 1

    


    

    
4969

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = ( jp(k)   *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(6) + 1

    


    

    
4970

    
    

    

    


    

    
4971

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
4972

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
4973

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
4974

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
4975

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
4976

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
4977

    
    
3428352

    
        ind0p = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
4978

    
    
3428352

    
        ind1p = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
4979

    
    

    

    


    

    
4980

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
4981

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
4982

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
4983

    
    

    

    


    

    
4984

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)

    


    

    
4985

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp

    


    

    
4986

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (ratco2 > 3.0) then

    


    

    
4987

    
    

    
          adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.77

    


    

    
4988

    
    

    
          adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp

    


    

    
4989

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
4990

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
          adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4991

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
4992

    
    

    

    


    

    
4993

    ✓✓
    
30910464

    
        do ig = 1, ng06

    


    

    
4994

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k)        &

    


    

    
4995

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))

    


    

    
4996

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          taufor  = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k)           &

    


    

    
4997

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))

    


    

    
4998

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          absco2  = ka_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k)                     &

    


    

    
4999

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (ka_mco2(ig,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,indm))

    


    

    
5000

    
    

    

    


    

    
5001

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
54853632

    
          taug(ns06+ig,k) = colamt(k,1)                                 &

    


    

    
5002

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p)   &

    


    

    
5003

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            +  fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p))  &

    


    

    
5004

    
    

    
     &            +  tauself + taufor + adjcolco2*absco2                &

    


    

    
5005

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
54853632

    
     &            +  wx(k,2)*cfc11adj(ig) + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig)

    


    

    
5006

    
    

    

    


    

    
5007

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
30855168

    
          fracs(ns06+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig)

    


    

    
5008

    
    

    
        enddo

    


    

    
5009

    
    

    
      enddo

    


    

    
5010

    
    

    

    


    

    
5011

    
    

    
!  --- ...  upper atmosphere loop

    


    

    
5012

    
    

    
!           nothing important goes on above laytrop in this band.

    


    

    
5013

    
    

    

    


    

    
5014

    ✓✓
    
995328

    
      do k = laytrop+1, nlay

    


    

    
5015

    ✓✓
    
8515584

    
        do ig = 1, ng06

    ✗✓✗✓

7520256

    
          taug(ns06+ig,k) = wx(k,2)*cfc11adj(ig) + wx(k,3)*cfc12(ig)

5018

      end subroutine taugb06

5025

    
    

    

    


    

    
5026

    
    

    
!> Band 7:  980-1080 cm-1 (low key - h2o,o3; low minor - co2)

    


    

    
5027

    
    

    
!!                        (high key - o3; high minor - co2)

    


    

    
5028

    
    

    
! ----------------------------------

    


    

    
5029

    
    
55296

    
      subroutine taugb07

    


    

    
5030

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
5031

    
    

    

    


    

    
5032

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5033

    
    

    
!     band 7:  980-1080 cm-1 (low key - h2o,o3; low minor - co2)       !

    


    

    
5034

    
    

    
!                            (high key - o3; high minor - co2)         !

    


    

    
5035

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5036

    
    

    

    


    

    
5037

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb07

    


    

    
5038

    
    

    

    


    

    
5039

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5040

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &

    


    

    
5041

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, indm, indmp,     &

    


    

    
5042

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmco2, jmco2p,   &

    


    

    
5043

    
    
55296

    
     &       jpl, jplp, ig, js, js1

    


    

    
5044

    
    

    

    


    

    
5045

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, co2m1, co2m2, absco2,   &

    


    

    
5046

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,         &

    


    

    
5047

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,        &

    


    

    
5048

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb_mco2,  specparm_mco2,  specmult_mco2,  fmco2,      &

    


    

    
5049

    
    
55296

    
     &      speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,        &

    


    

    
5050

    
    
55296

    
     &      refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2,     &

    


    

    
5051

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,             &

    


    

    
5052

    
    
55296

    
     &      fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,             &

    


    

    
5053

    
    
55296

    
     &      p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp

    


    

    
5054

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5055

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
5056

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5057

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level :

    


    

    
5058

    
    

    
!     lower - co2, p = 706.2620 mbar, t= 278.94 k

    


    

    
5059

    
    

    
!     upper - co2, p = 12.9350 mbar, t = 234.01 k

    


    

    
5060

    
    

    

    


    

    
5061

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
5062

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower atmosphere.

    


    

    
5063

    
    

    

    


    

    
5064

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(3,3)     ! P = 706.2620 mb

    


    

    
5065

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(3,3)          ! P = 706.2720 mb

    


    

    
5066

    
    

    

    


    

    
5067

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
5068

    
    

    

    


    

    
5069

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5070

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,2,1)*colamt(k,3)

    


    

    
5071

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
5072

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
5073

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5074

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5075

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(7) + js

    


    

    
5076

    
    

    

    


    

    
5077

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,2,2)*colamt(k,3)

    


    

    
5078

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1

    


    

    
5079

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
5080

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
5081

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
5082

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(7) + js1

    


    

    
5083

    
    

    

    


    

    
5084

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_mco2 = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,3)

    


    

    
5085

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_mco2 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco2

    


    

    
5086

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_mco2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco2, oneminus)

    


    

    
5087

    
    
3428352

    
        jmco2 = 1 + int(specmult_mco2)

    


    

    
5088

    
    
3428352

    
        fmco2 = mod(specmult_mco2, f_one)

    


    

    
5089

    
    

    

    


    

    
5090

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,3)

    


    

    
5091

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
5092

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)

    


    

    
5093

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
5094

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)

    


    

    
5095

    
    

    

    


    

    
5096

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
5097

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
5098

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
5099

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
5100

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
5101

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
5102

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
5103

    
    
3428352

    
        jmco2p= jmco2+ 1

    


    

    
5104

    
    
3428352

    
        ind0p = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
5105

    
    
3428352

    
        ind1p = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
5106

    
    

    

    


    

    
5107

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of CO2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
5108

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of CO2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
5109

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
5110

    
    

    

    


    

    
5111

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)

    


    

    
5112

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp

    


    

    
5113

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (ratco2 > 3.0) then

    


    

    
5114

    
    

    
          adjfac = 3.0 + (ratco2-3.0)**0.79

    


    

    
5115

    
    

    
          adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp

    


    

    
5116

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
5117

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
          adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
5118

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
5119

    
    

    

    


    

    
5120

    ✓✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm < 0.125) then

    


    

    
5121

    
    
399280

    
          p0 = fs - f_one

    


    

    
5122

    
    
399280

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
5123

    
    
399280

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
5124

    
    
399280

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
5125

    
    
399280

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

    


    

    
5126

    
    

    

    


    

    
5127

    
    
399280

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
5128

5129

5130

5131

5132

    ✓✓
    
3029072

    
        elseif (specparm > 0.875) then

    


    

    
5134

    
    
188471

    
          p0 = -fs

    


    

    
5135

    
    
188471

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
5136

5137

          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

188471

    ✗✓✗✓

!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
5241

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
5242

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    ✓✓
    
995328

    
      do k = laytrop+1, nlay

    


    

    
5245

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
940032

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)

    


    

    
5246

    ✗✓✗✓

    
940032

    
        ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp

    


    

    
5247

    ✗✓
    
940032

    
        if (ratco2 > 3.0) then

    


    

    
5248

    
    

    
          adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.79

    


    

    
5249

5250

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
5251

    ✗✓✗✓

    
940032

      subroutine taugb08

    


    

    
5293

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
5294

    
    

    

    


    

    
5295

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5296

    
    

    
!     band 8:  1080-1180 cm-1 (low key - h2o; low minor - co2,o3,n2o)  !

    


    

    
5297

    
    

    
!                             (high key - o3; high minor - co2, n2o)   !

    


    

    
5298

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5299

    
    

    

    


    

    
5300

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb08

    


    

    
5301

    
    

    

    


    

    
5302

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5303

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &

    


    

    
5304

    
    
55296

    
     &       indm, indmp, ig

    


    

    
5305

    
    

    

    


    

    
5306

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, absco2, abso3, absn2o,  &

    


    

    
5307

    
    
55296

    
     &      ratco2, adjfac, adjcolco2, temp

    


    

    
5308

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5309

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
5310

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5311

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level:

    


    

    
5312

    
    

    
!     lower - co2, p = 1053.63 mb, t = 294.2 k

    


    

    
5313

    
    

    
!     lower - o3,  p = 317.348 mb, t = 240.77 k

    


    

    
5314

    
    

    
!     lower - n2o, p = 706.2720 mb, t= 278.94 k

    


    

    
5315

    
    

    
!     lower - cfc12,cfc11

    


    

    
5316

    
    

    
!     upper - co2, p = 35.1632 mb, t = 223.28 k

    


    

    
5317

    
    

    
!     upper - n2o, p = 8.716e-2 mb, t = 226.03 k

    


    

    
5318

    
    

    

    


    

    
5319

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
5320

    
    

    

    


    

    
5321

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5322

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt (k)-1)) * nspa(8) + 1

    


    

    
5323

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = ( jp(k)   *5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(8) + 1

    


    

    
5324

    
    

    

    


    

    
5325

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
5326

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
5327

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
5328

    
    
3428352

    
        ind0p = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
5329

    
    
3428352

    
        ind1p = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
5330

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
5331

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
5332

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
5333

    
    

    

    


    

    
5334

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
5335

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
5336

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
5337

    
    

    

    


    

    
5338

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * chi_mls(2,jp(k)+1)

    


    

    
5339

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp

    


    

    
5340

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (ratco2 > 3.0) then

    


    

    
5341

    
    

    
          adjfac = 2.0 + (ratco2-2.0)**0.65

    


    

    
5342

    
    

    
          adjcolco2 = adjfac * temp

    


    

    
5343

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
5344

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
          adjcolco2 = colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
5345

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
5346

    
    

    

    


    

    
5347

    ✓✓
    
30910464

    
        do ig = 1, ng08

    


    

    
5348

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          tauself = selffac(k) * (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k)        &

    


    

    
5349

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))

    


    

    
5350

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          taufor  = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k)           &

    


    

    
5351

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))

    


    

    
5352

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          absco2  = (ka_mco2(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k)                    &

    


    

    
5353

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (ka_mco2(ig,indmp) - ka_mco2(ig,indm)))

    


    

    
5354

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          abso3   = (ka_mo3(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k)                     &

    


    

    
5355

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (ka_mo3(ig,indmp) - ka_mo3(ig,indm)))

    


    

    
5356

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
          absn2o  = (ka_mn2o(ig,indm) + minorfrac(k)                    &

    


    

    
5357

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (ka_mn2o(ig,indmp) - ka_mn2o(ig,indm)))

    


    

    
5358

    
    

    

    


    

    
5359

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
54853632

    
          taug(ns08+ig,k) = colamt(k,1)                                 &

    


    

    
5360

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            * (fac00(k)*absa(ig,ind0) + fac10(k)*absa(ig,ind0p)   &

    


    

    
5361

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
27426816

    
     &            +  fac01(k)*absa(ig,ind1) + fac11(k)*absa(ig,ind1p))  &

    


    

    
5362

    
    

    
     &            + tauself+taufor + adjcolco2*absco2                   &

    


    

    
5363

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

     &            + colamt(k,3)*abso3 + colamt(k,4)*absn2o              &

    ✗✓✗✓

5365

    ✗✓✗✓

30855168

5367

    
    

    
        enddo

    


    

    
5368

5382

5383

      end subroutine taugb08

    


    

    
5412

5413

    
    

    

    


    

    
5414

    
    

    
!> Band 9:  1180-1390 cm-1 (low key - h2o,ch4; low minor - n2o)

    


    

    
5415

    
    

    
!!                         (high key - ch4; high minor - n2o)

    


    

    
5416

    
    

    
! ----------------------------------

    


    

    
5417

    
    
55296

    
      subroutine taugb09

    


    

    
5418

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
5419

    
    

    

    


    

    
5420

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5421

    
    

    
!     band 9:  1180-1390 cm-1 (low key - h2o,ch4; low minor - n2o)     !

    


    

    
5422

    
    

    
!                             (high key - ch4; high minor - n2o)       !

    


    

    
5423

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5424

    
    

    

    


    

    
5425

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb09

    


    

    
5426

    
    

    

    


    

    
5427

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5428

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind0p, ind1, ind1p, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, &

    


    

    
5429

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, indm, indmp,     &

    


    

    
5430

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmn2o, jmn2op,   &

    


    

    
5431

    
    
55296

    
     &       jpl, jplp, ig, js, js1

    


    

    
5432

    
    

    

    


    

    
5433

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, n2om1, n2om2, absn2o,   &

    


    

    
5434

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,        &

    


    

    
5435

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,       &

    


    

    
5436

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_mn2o,  specparm_mn2o,  specmult_mn2o,  fmn2o,     &

    


    

    
5437

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,       &

    


    

    
5438

    
    
55296

    
     &       refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, ratn2o, adjfac, adjcoln2o,    &

    


    

    
5439

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,            &

    


    

    
5440

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,            &

    


    

    
5441

    
    
55296

    
     &       p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp

    


    

    
5442

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5443

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
5444

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5445

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level :

    


    

    
5446

    
    

    
!     lower - n2o, p = 706.272 mbar, t = 278.94 k

    


    

    
5447

    
    

    
!     upper - n2o, p = 95.58 mbar, t = 215.7 k

    


    

    
5448

    
    

    

    


    

    
5449

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
5450

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.

    


    

    
5451

    
    

    

    


    

    
5452

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,9)/chi_mls(6,9)       ! P = 212 mb

    


    

    
5453

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(6,3)            ! P = 706.272 mb

    


    

    
5454

    
    

    

    


    

    
5455

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
5456

    
    

    

    


    

    
5457

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5458

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,1)*colamt(k,5)

    


    

    
5459

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
5460

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
5461

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5462

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5463

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(9) + js

    


    

    
5464

    
    

    

    


    

    
5465

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,4,2)*colamt(k,5)

    


    

    
5466

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1

    


    

    
5467

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
5468

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
5469

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
5470

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(9) + js1

    


    

    
5471

    
    

    

    


    

    
5472

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_mn2o = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,5)

    


    

    
5473

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_mn2o = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mn2o

    


    

    
5474

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_mn2o = 8.0 * min(specparm_mn2o, oneminus)

    


    

    
5475

    
    
3428352

    
        jmn2o = 1 + int(specmult_mn2o)

    


    

    
5476

    
    
3428352

    
        fmn2o = mod(specmult_mn2o, f_one)

    


    

    
5477

    
    

    

    


    

    
5478

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,5)

    


    

    
5479

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
5480

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)

    


    

    
5481

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
5482

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)

    


    

    
5483

    
    

    

    


    

    
5484

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
5485

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
5486

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
5487

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
5488

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
5489

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
5490

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
5491

    
    
3428352

    
        jmn2op= jmn2o+ 1

    


    

    
5492

    
    

    

    


    

    
5493

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of n2o is too great to be considered

    


    

    
5494

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of n2o by an empirical factor

    


    

    
5495

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
5496

    
    

    

    


    

    
5497

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * chi_mls(4,jp(k)+1)

    


    

    
5498

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ratn2o = colamt(k,4) / temp

    


    

    
5499

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (ratn2o > 1.5) then

    


    

    
5500

    
    

    
          adjfac = 0.5 + (ratn2o-0.5)**0.65

    


    

    
5501

    
    

    
          adjcoln2o = adjfac * temp

    


    

    
5502

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
5503

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
          adjcoln2o = colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
5504

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
5505

    
    

    

    


    

    
5506

    ✓✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm < 0.125) then

    


    

    
5507

    
    
408009

    
          p0 = fs - f_one

    


    

    
5508

    
    
408009

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
5509

    
    
408009

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
5510

    
    
408009

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
5511

    
    
408009

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

    


    

    
5512

    
    

    

    


    

    
5513

    
    
408009

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
5514

5774

3428352

    ✓✓

!> Band 12:  1800-2080 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - nothing)

    


    

    
5834

    
    

    
! ----------------------------------

    


    

    
5835

    
    
55296

    
      subroutine taugb12

    


    

    
5836

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
5837

    
    

    

    


    

    
5838

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5839

    
    

    
!     band 12:  1800-2080 cm-1 (low - h2o,co2; high - nothing)         !

    


    

    
5840

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5841

    
    

    

    


    

    
5842

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb12

    


    

    
5843

    
    

    

    


    

    
5844

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5845

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, jpl, jplp,    &

    


    

    
5846

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, ig, js, js1,     &

    


    

    
5847

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211

    


    

    
5848

    
    

    

    


    

    
5849

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, refrat_planck_a,        &

    


    

    
5850

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,        &

    


    

    
5851

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,       &

    


    

    
5852

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,       &

    


    

    
5853

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,            &

    


    

    
5854

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,            &

    


    

    
5855

    
    
55296

    
     &       p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21

    


    

    
5856

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5857

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
5858

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5859

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
5860

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.

    


    

    
5861

    
    

    

    


    

    
5862

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,10)/chi_mls(2,10)      ! P =   174.164 mb

    


    

    
5863

    
    

    

    


    

    
5864

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
5865

    
    

    

    


    

    
5866

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5867

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,1)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
5868

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
5869

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
5870

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5871

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5872

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(12) + js

    


    

    
5873

    
    

    

    


    

    
5874

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,1,2)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
5875

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1

    


    

    
5876

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
5877

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
5878

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
5879

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(12) + js1

    


    

    
5880

    
    

    

    


    

    
5881

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
5882

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
5883

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm_planck >= oneminus) specparm_planck=oneminus

    


    

    
5884

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * specparm_planck

    


    

    
5885

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
5886

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)

    


    

    
5887

    
    

    

    


    

    
5888

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
5889

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
5890

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
5891

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
5892

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
5893

    
    

    

    


    

    
5894

    ✓✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm < 0.125) then

    


    

    
5895

    
    
502669

    
          p0 = fs - f_one

    


    

    
5896

    
    
502669

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
5897

    
    
502669

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
5898

    
    
502669

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
5899

    
    
502669

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

    


    

    
5900

    
    

    

    


    

    
5901

    
    
502669

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
5902

    
    
502669

    
          id010 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
5903

    
    
502669

    
          id100 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
5904

    
    
502669

    
          id110 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
5905

    
    
502669

    
          id200 = ind0 + 2

    


    

    
5906

    
    
502669

    
          id210 = ind0 +11

    


    

    
5907

    ✓✓
    
2925683

    
        elseif (specparm > 0.875) then

    


    

    
5908

    
    
1835

    
          p0 = -fs

    


    

    
5909

    
    
1835

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
5910

    
    
1835

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
5911

    
    
1835

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
5912

    
    
1835

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

5914

    
    
1835

    
          id000 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
5915

5916

          id100 = ind0

    


    

    
5917

5918

5919

          id210 = ind0 + 8

          fk00 = f_one - fs

    ✗✓✗✓

55296

    
      subroutine taugb13

    


    

    
6023

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
6024

    
    

    

    


    

    
6025

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
6026

    
    

    
!     band 13:  2080-2250 cm-1 (low key-h2o,n2o; high minor-o3 minor)  !

    


    

    
6027

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
6028

    
    

    

    


    

    
6029

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb13

    


    

    
6030

    
    

    

    


    

    
6031

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
6032

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp,  &

    


    

    
6033

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jmco2, jpl,      &

    


    

    
6034

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmco2p, jplp,    &

    


    

    
6035

    
    
55296

    
     &       jmco, jmcop, ig, js, js1

    


    

    
6036

    
    

    

    


    

    
6037

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: tauself, taufor, co2m1, co2m2, absco2,   &

    


    

    
6038

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,        &

    


    

    
6039

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,       &

    


    

    
6040

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_mco2,  specparm_mco2,  specmult_mco2,  fmco2,     &

    


    

    
6041

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_mco,   specparm_mco,   specmult_mco,   fmco,      &

    


    

    
6042

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,       &

    


    

    
6043

    
    
55296

    
     &       refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, refrat_m_a3, ratco2,          &

    


    

    
6044

    
    
55296

    
     &       adjfac, adjcolco2, com1, com2, absco, abso3,               &

    


    

    
6045

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,            &

    


    

    
6046

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,            &

    


    

    
6047

    
    
55296

    
     &       p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21, temp

    


    

    
6048

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
6049

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
6050

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
6051

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping levels :

    


    

    
6052

    
    

    
!     lower - co2, p = 1053.63 mb, t = 294.2 k

    


    

    
6053

    
    

    
!     lower - co, p = 706 mb, t = 278.94 k

    


    

    
6054

    
    

    
!     upper - o3, p = 95.5835 mb, t = 215.7 k

    


    

    
6055

    
    

    

    


    

    
6056

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
6057

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower/upper atmosphere.

    


    

    
6058

    
    

    

    


    

    
6059

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(1,5)/chi_mls(4,5)        ! P = 473.420 mb (Level 5)

    


    

    
6060

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a = chi_mls(1,1)/chi_mls(4,1)             ! P = 1053. (Level 1)

    


    

    
6061

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a3 = chi_mls(1,3)/chi_mls(4,3)            ! P = 706. (Level 3)

    


    

    
6062

    
    

    

    


    

    
6063

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
6064

    
    

    

    


    

    
6065

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
6066

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,3,1)*colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
6067

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,1) / speccomb

    


    

    
6068

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
6069

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
6070

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
6071

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(13) + js

    


    

    
6072

    
    

    

    


    

    
6073

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,1) + rfrate(k,3,2)*colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
6074

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb1

    


    

    
6075

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
6076

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
6077

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
6078

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(13) + js1

    


    

    
6079

    
    

    

    


    

    
6080

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_mco2 = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
6081

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_mco2 = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco2

    


    

    
6082

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_mco2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco2, oneminus)

    


    

    
6083

    
    
3428352

    
        jmco2 = 1 + int(specmult_mco2)

    


    

    
6084

    
    
3428352

    
        fmco2 = mod(specmult_mco2, f_one)

    


    

    
6085

    
    

    

    


    

    
6086

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
6087

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
6088

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
6089

    
    

    

    


    

    
6090

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_mco = colamt(k,1) + refrat_m_a3*colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
6091

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_mco = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_mco

    


    

    
6092

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_mco = 8.0 * min(specparm_mco, oneminus)

    


    

    
6093

    
    
3428352

    
        jmco = 1 + int(specmult_mco)

    


    

    
6094

    
    
3428352

    
        fmco = mod(specmult_mco, f_one)

    


    

    
6095

    
    

    

    


    

    
6096

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,1) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,4)

    


    

    
6097

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,1) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
6098

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)

    


    

    
6099

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
6100

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)

    


    

    
6101

    
    

    

    


    

    
6102

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
6103

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
6104

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
6105

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
6106

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
6107

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
6108

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
6109

    
    
3428352

    
        jmco2p= jmco2+ 1

    


    

    
6110

    
    
3428352

    
        jmcop = jmco + 1

    


    

    
6111

    
    

    

    


    

    
6112

    
    

    
!  --- ...  in atmospheres where the amount of co2 is too great to be considered

    


    

    
6113

    
    

    
!           a minor species, adjust the column amount of co2 by an empirical factor

    


    

    
6114

    
    

    
!           to obtain the proper contribution.

    


    

    
6115

    
    

    

    


    

    
6116

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        temp   = coldry(k) * 3.55e-4

    


    

    
6117

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ratco2 = colamt(k,2) / temp

    


    

    
6118

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (ratco2 > 3.0) then

6314

    
    

    
      enddo

    ✓✓

      do k = laytrop+1, nlay

    


    

    
6319

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

        ind0 = ((jp(k)-13)*5 + (jt (k)-1)) * nspb(14) + 1

    ✗✓✗✓

3760128

    
          taug(ns14+ig,k) = colamt(k,2)                                 &

!!                          (high - nothing)

    


    

    
6340

    
    

    
! ----------------------------------

    


    

    
6341

    
    
55296

    
      subroutine taugb15

    


    

    
6342

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
6343

    
    

    

    


    

    
6344

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
6345

    
    

    
!     band 15:  2380-2600 cm-1 (low - n2o,co2; low minor - n2)         !

    


    

    
6346

    
    

    
!                              (high - nothing)                        !

    


    

    
6347

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
6348

    
    

    

    


    

    
6349

    
    

    
      use module_radlw_kgb15

    


    

    
6350

    
    

    

    


    

    
6351

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
6352

    
    
55296

    
      integer :: k, ind0, ind1, inds, indsp, indf, indfp, indm, indmp,  &

    


    

    
6353

    
    
55296

    
     &       id000, id010, id100, id110, id200, id210, jpl, jplp,       &

    


    

    
6354

    
    
55296

    
     &       id001, id011, id101, id111, id201, id211, jmn2, jmn2p,     &

    


    

    
6355

    
    
55296

    
     &       ig, js, js1

    


    

    
6356

    
    

    

    


    

    
6357

    
    
55296

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: scalen2, tauself, taufor,                &

    


    

    
6358

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb,       specparm,       specmult,       fs,        &

    


    

    
6359

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb1,      specparm1,      specmult1,      fs1,       &

    


    

    
6360

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_mn2,   specparm_mn2,   specmult_mn2,   fmn2,      &

    


    

    
6361

    
    
55296

    
     &       speccomb_planck,specparm_planck,specmult_planck,fpl,       &

    


    

    
6362

    
    
55296

    
     &       refrat_planck_a, refrat_m_a, n2m1, n2m2, taun2,            &

    


    

    
6363

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac000, fac100, fac200, fac010, fac110, fac210,            &

    


    

    
6364

    
    
55296

    
     &       fac001, fac101, fac201, fac011, fac111, fac211,            &

    


    

    
6365

    
    
55296

    
     &       p0, p40, fk00, fk10, fk20, p1, p41, fk01, fk11, fk21

    


    

    
6366

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
6367

    
    

    
!===> ...  begin here

    


    

    
6368

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
6369

    
    

    
!  --- ...  minor gas mapping level :

    


    

    
6370

    
    

    
!     lower - nitrogen continuum, P = 1053., T = 294.

    


    

    
6371

    
    

    

    


    

    
6372

    
    

    
!  --- ...  calculate reference ratio to be used in calculation of Planck

    


    

    
6373

    
    

    
!           fraction in lower atmosphere.

    


    

    
6374

    
    

    

    


    

    
6375

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_planck_a = chi_mls(4,1)/chi_mls(2,1)      ! P = 1053. mb (Level 1)

    


    

    
6376

    
    
55296

    
      refrat_m_a = chi_mls(4,1)/chi_mls(2,1)           ! P = 1053. mb

    


    

    
6377

    
    

    

    


    

    
6378

    
    

    
!  --- ...  lower atmosphere loop

    


    

    
6379

    
    

    

    


    

    
6380

    ✓✓
    
3483648

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
6381

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,4) + rfrate(k,5,1)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
6382

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm = colamt(k,4) / speccomb

    


    

    
6383

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(specparm, oneminus)

    


    

    
6384

    
    
3428352

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
6385

    
    
3428352

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
6386

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind0 = ((jp(k)-1)*5 + (jt(k)-1)) * nspa(15) + js

    


    

    
6387

    
    

    

    


    

    
6388

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb1 = colamt(k,4) + rfrate(k,5,2)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
6389

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm1 = colamt(k,4) / speccomb1

    


    

    
6390

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult1 = 8.0 * min(specparm1, oneminus)

    


    

    
6391

    
    
3428352

    
        js1 = 1 + int(specmult1)

    


    

    
6392

    
    
3428352

    
        fs1 = mod(specmult1, f_one)

    


    

    
6393

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        ind1 = (jp(k)*5 + (jt1(k)-1)) * nspa(15) + js1

    


    

    
6394

    
    

    

    


    

    
6395

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_mn2 = colamt(k,4) + refrat_m_a*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
6396

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_mn2 = colamt(k,4) / speccomb_mn2

    


    

    
6397

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_mn2 = 8.0 * min(specparm_mn2, oneminus)

    


    

    
6398

    
    
3428352

    
        jmn2 = 1 + int(specmult_mn2)

    


    

    
6399

    
    
3428352

    
        fmn2 = mod(specmult_mn2, f_one)

    


    

    
6400

    
    

    

    


    

    
6401

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        speccomb_planck = colamt(k,4) + refrat_planck_a*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
6402

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        specparm_planck = colamt(k,4) / speccomb_planck

    


    

    
6403

    
    
3428352

    
        specmult_planck = 8.0 * min(specparm_planck, oneminus)

    


    

    
6404

    
    
3428352

    
        jpl = 1 + int(specmult_planck)

    


    

    
6405

    
    
3428352

    
        fpl = mod(specmult_planck, f_one)

    


    

    
6406

    
    

    

    


    

    
6407

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        scalen2 = colbrd(k) * scaleminor(k)

    


    

    
6408

    
    

    

    


    

    
6409

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
6410

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indf = indfor(k)

    


    

    
6411

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        indm = indminor(k)

    


    

    
6412

    
    
3428352

    
        indsp = inds + 1

    


    

    
6413

    
    
3428352

    
        indfp = indf + 1

    


    

    
6414

    
    
3428352

    
        indmp = indm + 1

    


    

    
6415

    
    
3428352

    
        jplp  = jpl  + 1

    


    

    
6416

    
    
3428352

    
        jmn2p = jmn2 + 1

    


    

    
6417

    
    

    

    


    

    
6418

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm < 0.125) then

    


    

    
6419

    
    

    
          p0 = fs - f_one

    


    

    
6420

    
    

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
6421

    
    

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
6422

    
    

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
6423

    
    

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

    


    

    
6424

    
    

    

    


    

    
6425

    
    

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
6426

    
    

    
          id010 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
6427

    
    

    
          id100 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
6428

    
    

    
          id110 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
6429

    
    

    
          id200 = ind0 + 2

    


    

    
6430

    
    

    
          id210 = ind0 +11

    


    

    
6431

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        elseif (specparm > 0.875) then

    


    

    
6432

    
    

    
          p0 = -fs

    


    

    
6433

    
    

    
          p40 = p0**4

    


    

    
6434

    
    

    
          fk00 = p40

    


    

    
6435

    
    

    
          fk10 = f_one - p0 - 2.0*p40

    


    

    
6436

    
    

    
          fk20 = p0 + p40

    


    

    
6437

    
    

    

    


    

    
6438

    
    

    
          id000 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
6439

    
    

    
          id010 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
6440

    
    

    
          id100 = ind0

    


    

    
6441

    
    

    
          id110 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
6442

    
    

    
          id200 = ind0 - 1

    


    

    
6443

    
    

    
          id210 = ind0 + 8

    


    

    
6444

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
6445

    
    
3428352

    
          fk00 = f_one - fs

    


    

    
6446

    
    
3428352

    
          fk10 = fs

    


    

    
6447

    
    
3428352

    
          fk20 = f_zero

    


    

    
6448

    
    

    

    


    

    
6449

    
    
3428352

    
          id000 = ind0

    


    

    
6450

    
    
3428352

    
          id010 = ind0 + 9

    


    

    
6451

    
    
3428352

    
          id100 = ind0 + 1

    


    

    
6452

    
    
3428352

    
          id110 = ind0 +10

    


    

    
6453

    
    
3428352

    
          id200 = ind0

    


    

    
6454

    
    
3428352

    
          id210 = ind0

    


    

    
6455

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
6456

    
    

    

    


    

    
6457

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac000 = fk00 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
6458

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac100 = fk10 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
6459

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac200 = fk20 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
6460

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac010 = fk00 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
6461

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac110 = fk10 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
6462

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac210 = fk20 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
6463

    
    

    

    


    

    
6464

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        if (specparm1 < 0.125) then

    


    

    
6465

    
    

    
          p1 = fs1 - f_one

    


    

    
6466

    
    

    
          p41 = p1**4

    


    

    
6467

    
    

    
          fk01 = p41

    


    

    
6468

    
    

    
          fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41

    


    

    
6469

    
    

    
          fk21 = p1 + p41

    


    

    
6470

    
    

    

    


    

    
6471

    
    

    
          id001 = ind1

    


    

    
6472

    
    

    
          id011 = ind1 + 9

    


    

    
6473

    
    

    
          id101 = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
6474

    
    

    
          id111 = ind1 +10

    


    

    
6475

    
    

    
          id201 = ind1 + 2

    


    

    
6476

    
    

    
          id211 = ind1 +11

    


    

    
6477

    ✗✓
    
3428352

    
        elseif (specparm1 > 0.875) then

    


    

    
6478

    
    

    
          p1 = -fs1

    


    

    
6479

    
    

    
          p41 = p1**4

    


    

    
6480

    
    

    
          fk01 = p41

    


    

    
6481

    
    

    
          fk11 = f_one - p1 - 2.0*p41

    


    

    
6482

    
    

    
          fk21 = p1 + p41

    


    

    
6483

    
    

    

    


    

    
6484

    
    

    
          id001 = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
6485

    
    

    
          id011 = ind1 +10

    


    

    
6486

    
    

    
          id101 = ind1

    


    

    
6487

    
    

    
          id111 = ind1 + 9

    


    

    
6488

    
    

    
          id201 = ind1 - 1

    


    

    
6489

    
    

    
          id211 = ind1 + 8

    


    

    
6490

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
6491

    
    
3428352

    
          fk01 = f_one - fs1

    


    

    
6492

    
    
3428352

    
          fk11 = fs1

    


    

    
6493

    
    
3428352

    
          fk21 = f_zero

    


    

    
6494

    
    

    

    


    

    
6495

    
    
3428352

    
          id001 = ind1

    


    

    
6496

    
    
3428352

    
          id011 = ind1 + 9

    


    

    
6497

    
    
3428352

    
          id101 = ind1 + 1

    


    

    
6498

    
    
3428352

    
          id111 = ind1 +10

    


    

    
6499

    
    
3428352

    
          id201 = ind1

    


    

    
6500

    
    
3428352

    
          id211 = ind1

    


    

    
6501

    
    

    
        endif

    


    

    
6502

    
    

    

    


    

    
6503

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac001 = fk01 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
6504

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac101 = fk11 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
6505

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac201 = fk21 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
6506

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac011 = fk01 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
6507

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac111 = fk11 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
6508

    ✗✓✗✓

    
3428352

    
        fac211 = fk21 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
6509

    
    

    

    


    

    
6510

    ✓✓
    
10340352

    
        do ig = 1, ng15

    


    

    
6511

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
          tauself = selffac(k)* (selfref(ig,inds) + selffrac(k)         &

    


    

    
6512

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &            * (selfref(ig,indsp) - selfref(ig,inds)))

    


    

    
6513

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
          taufor  = forfac(k) * (forref(ig,indf) + forfrac(k)           &

    


    

    
6514

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &            * (forref(ig,indfp) - forref(ig,indf)))

    


    

    
6515

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
          n2m1    = ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indm) + fmn2                         &

    


    

    
6516

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &            * (ka_mn2(ig,jmn2p,indm) - ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indm))

    


    

    
6517

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
          n2m2    = ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indmp) + fmn2                        &

    


    

    
6518

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &            * (ka_mn2(ig,jmn2p,indmp) - ka_mn2(ig,jmn2,indmp))

    


    

    
6519

    ✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
          taun2   = scalen2 * (n2m1 + minorfrac(k) * (n2m2 - n2m1))

    


    

    
6520

    
    

    

    


    

    
6521

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
13713408

    
          taug(ns15+ig,k) = speccomb                                    &

    


    

    
6522

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &                * (fac000*absa(ig,id000) + fac010*absa(ig,id010)  &

    


    

    
6523

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &                +  fac100*absa(ig,id100) + fac110*absa(ig,id110)  &

    


    

    
6524

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &                +  fac200*absa(ig,id200) + fac210*absa(ig,id210)) &

    


    

    
6525

    
    

    
     &                +     speccomb1                                   &

    


    

    
6526

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6856704

    
     &                * (fac001*absa(ig,id001) + fac011*absa(ig,id011)  &

    ✗✓✗✓

          fracs(ns15+ig,k) = fracrefa(ig,jpl) + fpl                     &

      subroutine taugb16

    


    

    
6553

    
    

    
! ..................................

    


    

    
6554

!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !
